com.conquest.mapeditor.model

Class CountryModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.conquest.mapeditor.model.CountryModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CountryModel
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    CountryModel Class Initializes country name String, a ContinentModel ContinentModel as belongsTo and a ArrayList ArrayList as listofNeighbours.
    Author:
    Nancy Goyal
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
